2^2 = 4
2^3 = 8
2^3.5 = 11.313708498984760390413509793678
2 x 2 x 2.5

2^2.5 = 5.6568542494923801952067548968388

 5.6568542494923801952067548968388
-4
==============================
 1.6568542494923801952067548968388


1/2 X 2   2/1 X 1/2

5/2

= Square Root of 2^5 power

==================
Example
8^2/3
Cube Root of 8^2
= 4

2^2.25 = 225/100

2^225/100
100th Root of 2^225
